item.description:
The main meetup is on Friday (10/17) afternoon-evening (unless you want to show up for the kegger Saturday 6pm-1am). We plan to have handouts for folks wanting to see where all of the events are going to be for the weekend. Right now, I think we have six events going, but there may be as many as a dozen total for the whole Octoberfest, Free State Project event.

To get to my house on Friday, just come up Route 1 until you reach the traffic circle surrounding town hall. Veer left to the stop sign, then drive straight through (west) onto Folly Mill Road. Go straight until you reach Charles Henry Way, and turn left. My house is the light blue one at the end of the street.

If you get lost on Route 1, Folly Mill Road is south of Starbucks, Wendy's, and Home Depot.

Be sure to wear your Ron Paul/liberty gear, so that we can all recognize each other at events.

14 Charles Henry Way
Seabrook, NH

Max Abramson
Join us in New Hampshire for the Free State Project.
http://www.pledgebank...
item.name: Ron Paul Octoberfest Social
